channel.title: SHAPeS Spot | Index on SHAPeS Spot
channel.description: Recent content in SHAPeS Spot | Index on SHAPeS Spot

item.title: Legendary Curl Pull
item.description:
Recently,

I was bored out of my mind, so I decided “Hey… I wonder what will happen if I curled grok.com’s ping.txt So I did, i ran:

curl grok.com/ping.txt

And I got back this HUGE wall of HTML, JSON, CSS all the stuff. Well it turns out Grok’s whole IOS/Android/Car app with the voice stuff actually has descriptions and prompts for them! And they are hilarious, I don’t who Xai hired as prompt engineers, but they were feeling… creative.

item.title: My opinion on Vibe Coding
item.description:
Now…

Vibe Coding...

It’s a… subject thats for sure. I’m going to just come out and say Vibe Coding != Software Engineering. That is fact, you saying something and then doing a little Ctrl+C/Ctrl+V action isn’t programming, it’s prompting, and I mean REALLY prompting, endless amounts of times. Over. And. Over. Now I now you probably don’t care what I have to say about, but you should! Honestly, a buggy, insecure app that breaks when you try to add a new button because ChatGPT/Grok/Claude/Gemini/whateverthefuck forgot what it was doing or thought it’s a exotic bird is WAY better than a app that you spent time, effort, and (maybe) passion into that actual, which works more than a AI app! Just learn to program. That’s all I gotta say, stop hyping AI like it’s gonna make you a buncha money NVIDIA on the other hand.... Though, I do think using AI as a tool and not another brain or arm is great! Work smarter not harder everyone (granted that you know what the “smart” is!).

item.title: Why not Svelte?
item.description:
Oh god, I’m talking about a… FRAMEWORK!!

this is gonna make someone mad...

Okay… I like Svelete

And I don’t like React (mainly because of performance and it gets weird). lemme explain, the concept of being able to do all your logic, visuals, and styling in a single file, while keeping it separate from others is AWESOME! Which is one of the min reasons why I, and many others, enjoy Svelte. Also our framework isn’t being shoved down our throats by a lizard CEO of a gagillionbillion dollar tech company which also likes to spy on you allegedly.

item.title: About
item.description:
About

This site was proudly built with Hugo, because i didn’t want to write an entire site up. The theme is a “fork”(?) of Terminal by panr on Github. If you wanna send me a email it’s noah.g.270stx@gmail.com I recommend the subject field of the email to have [ShapesSpot] or something similar in it, I’ll pay more attention to it. Yeah, I thats all for a About page.

item.title: Bugs?
item.description:
If you find any bugs/typos

Head on over to my Github issues and send a issue or pr! But don’t be douche about it and send

 <!---
 plz accept i want shirt, dicklemickle2004
 --->

Because i WILL ignore them! Also if you want you can use the source code of this site to fork and make your own! It's kinda useless, its just a pre-made style and my blabbing.
